name: Rama Residence Padma
priceRange: Compare Average Prices from Our Partners Starting at $64 Per Night

reviews.review: Amazing staff and very comfortable. Roof pool awesome for watching the sunsets. Really enjoyed sitting in the restaurant and watching the busy shops and traffic go by while enjoying lovely Eggs Benedict for brekkie. Will definately be back again.

Great spot close to everything, the beach was at the end of the street, the shopping at Legian is great and the shops were next door. Breakfast was awesome, the french toast was delicious and my family enjoyed the big breakfast.. Amenities were great, everything...

My family stayed here for 11 nights and thoroughly enjoyed it. The location is ideal, being in the heart of Legian close to many restaurants and markets. We ate in the Rama Residence Asian Spice restaurant and found the food excellent. The included breakfast was...

Fantastic hotel in good area. Room was high quality and well presented. Breakfast were great with loads of choice. the pool area is gorgeous. Staff are all friendly and welcoming. we had z fantastic stay and would return.

the rooms were clean. close to the beach. plenty of cheap local warungs and more exepnsive restaurants close by. great breakfast. Orange balcony lights were a bit bright so they took the bulbs out for us. they even packed us a breakfast to take to...

What a wonderful welcome we received on arrival.The staff were so kind and polite.Richard and Indri were particularly attentive and helpful.The breakfast was amazing with a great choice.Our room was clean and bright....the bed so comfortable with the best pillows.We enjoyed the balconyvery much.The pool...

reviews.quotes: good hotel in centrum of Legian
reviews.review: we stayed with 3 persons in a Studio, room was big enough but there could be a bigger wardrobe in the roomCleaning of the room can be improved, the towels were changed daily but they had always spots on it?Staff is very friendly and helpful

Great location, walk to the beach, massage, coffee, shopping and restaurants. Our studio room was very comfortable, loved the bed, water cooler was a bonus. The view from our room wasn’t nice but didn’t spend a lot of time in there anyway, Rooftop pool was...

reviews.quotes: Wonderful Stay in a perfect location
reviews.review: My Partner and myself have just returned from 8 nights at the Rama Residence and what a wonderful 8 nights we had. This Hotel is in a great location for the Beach, Shopping, Eating and Drinking it had it all. Staff were wonderful and so...

Great location near the beach and lots of good restaurants close by. Room had block out curtains so i was able to sleep in after sunrise and was very quiet so did not hear traffic. Very comfy bed but towels always looked dirty even after...
